detail_desc: Kangol x H&M. Small bag decoration with a zip. Metal carabiner hook to attach it to your bag. Size approx. 9x7 cm.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with long sleeves and a seam with a knot detail at the waist. Unlined.

Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover and a concealed zip in one side. High waist with concealed elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Unlined. The polyester content of the skirt is partly recycled.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and flap back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Kangol x H&M. Double-layered hat in a soft knit with a lightly brushed finish. Turn-up at the hem with the Kangol logo on the front.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton and linen weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck, buttons down the front and smocking at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Blouse in a cool viscose weave with a grandad collar, button placket and gathered neckline. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets and straight legs with sewn-in creases. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Briefs in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The briefs are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
High-waisted trousers in stretch jersey containing glittery threads with a concealed zip in one side and slim legs.
Long cardigan in a soft, fluffy knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes along the sides.
Suede biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with inset glossy and mesh sections on the legs. Regular waist with wide elastication and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a jersey underskirt.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing, a padded edge and tongue, an embroidered motif on one side and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with an overlocked edge at the cuffs and hem.
Trainers with pompoms at the front, a lightly padded top edge, hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
V-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with low dropped shoulders, wide, tapered sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut blouse in washed cotton denim with frills. Frill-trimmed collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with frill-trimmed, buttoned cuffs.
Bikini briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Knee-length dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, tie belt and side pockets. Extra soft, brushed inside.
Short shorts in crisp twill made from a nylon and cotton blend. Elasticated waist, fake fly, side pockets, a welt back pocket and short slits in the sides.

Pyjamas with a T-shirt and bottoms in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a text print on the front and ribbing around the neckline. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short, lace butterfly sleeves and a narrow trim around the neckline.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a drawstring hood with a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and trousers in a soft, organic cotton blend. Printed bodysuit in jersey with appliqués on the front, raglan sleeves and press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Patterned velour trousers with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Sandals in imitation leather with an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with a drawstring at the top, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Voluminous, knee-length dress in jersey with concealed elastication and a frill trim around the top. Wide, bow-topped shoulder straps and a gathered seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Round sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
5-pocket denim jeans with a multistretch function that stretches in four directions for full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs.

Top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck, a wrapover front and short sleeves with cuffs and a covered button. Seams with short fringing at the shoulders and along the yoke, and a gathered seam at the waist with sewn-in ties at one side.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a tie or bow tie. Turn-down collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Adjustable tie/bow tie with a plastic fastener.
Spotted tie in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Width 6.5 cm.
Blouse in imitation leather with a pointed collar, press-studs down the front, long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a shawl collar, front pockets and detachable tie belt at the waist.

Shirt in a textured cotton weave with a cutaway collar, classic front, and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke at the back, a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with cap sleeves and a lace-trimmed hem.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Straight-cut shirt in a jacquard-weave moire silk blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with wide, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, and short slits in the sides.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons at one side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with picot trims. Gathered seam at the waist, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Short, fitted vest top in a soft rib knit with a round neckline.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Airy, fitted top in fine jersey made from a cotton blend with a deep U-shaped neck and extra-long sleeves. Vertical inset section front and back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Suede ankle boots with a concealed zip in one side and covered block heels. Satin linings, twill insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Twill trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned rubber soles.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a brushed finish. Drawstring hood, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, side pockets with a tab and press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and cuffs with press-studs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, airy, fine knit with sheer plumeti chiffon sleeves, a small frill trim over the shoulders and at the cuffs, and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops and a motif on the shaft.
Rugby shirt in soft jersey with a contrasting colour collar, concealed buttons at the top, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and tapered legs with creases.
Wide, shorter-style top in cotton jersey with cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Long, straight-cut top in marled sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and long dolman sleeves with pleats and ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Make-up bag a zip at the top that continues down the short sides. Lined. Size approx. 7x11.5x18.5 cm.

Long, sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with a deep neckline front and back. Wide, gathered shoulder straps and a gathered seam under the bust, creating a gently draped effect at the top. Concealed zip in one side and tiers on the skirt for added width. Unlined.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide hem.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with medium coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and gathered frills at the top. The polyester content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Top in soft, block-patterned sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and a high stand-up collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a heart-shaped metal buckle. Width approx. 2 cm.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in washed, superstretch denim with worn details with patches on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button.
5-pocket shorts in slightly stretchy washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs. Slim fit.
Flat, round earrings in various designs. Diameter 1.3 cm.
Vest top in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Set with a top in soft jersey and shorts and a sun hat in a cotton weave. Top with short, flounced sleeves, a chest pocket and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Shorts with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Lined sun hat with ties under the chin. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline and short sleeves trimmed with a gathered frill.
Top in cotton piqué with long raglan sleeves, a small appliqué at the bottom and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
